sections.paragraph: யார், எது, என்ன ஆகிய பொருளைக் குறிக்கும் ஒட்டு - பெயரடை

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Probably a primary word (or perhaps a form of the article G3588); the relative (sometimes demonstrative) pronoun, who, which, what, that: - one, (an-, the) other, some, that, what, which, who (-m, -se), etc. See also G3757.
